attributes.action: Do not abandon the Dubs Scheme for refugee children
attributes.background: Theresa May has decided to shut down the Dubs Scheme - a promise by the Government to bring the most vulnerable refugee children to safety in the UK. Thousands of children the Government promised to help are still in danger. Sign to keep the Dubs Scheme alive and make parliament debate this issue.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
